titles.title: Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2005
Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2005

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce estate tax rates by 20 percent, to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to the equivalent of a $3,000,000 exclusion and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce estate tax rates and increase the unified estate tax credit to $3 million, with an inflation adjustment to such credit amount beginning in 2006.
